sentences.english: So the heaven testify, I already wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 所以苍天作证，我已全心全意。

sentences.english: He also demanded that his followers commit themselves to him wholeheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 他也要求他的跟随者全心全意的把自己交托给他。

sentences.english: He set an example of wholehearted service to the people.
sentences.chinese: 他是全心全意为人民服务的表率。

sentences.english: Are you doing it faithfully and in the best possible away?
sentences.chinese: 你有否尽忠职守，全心全意地把工作做好？

sentences.english: I swore that I would take part in the voting with all my soul.
sentences.chinese: 我暗自对天发誓，下次投票我一定全心投入。

sentences.english: As a consequence, people willingly and wholeheartedly give themselves to what she asks of them.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们心甘情愿地全心全意地听从她的请求。

sentences.english: Did you shy away from full-hearted service for the sake of Christ?
sentences.chinese: 可有逃避为基督的缘故全心全意作事奉？

sentences.english: No matter what themes, he whole heart to deduce songs in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 无论什么主题，他都全心去演绎出歌曲的神采。

sentences.english: He serves his people heart and soul has earned applause from many people.
sentences.chinese: 他全心全意为民服务，获得许多人的赞美。

sentences.english: A great leader has to commit -- body and soul -- to a team's goal and vision.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的领导要全心全意投入到团队的目标和愿景中。

sentences.english: Ilove you from the bottom of my heart.
He wants us to love with wholehearted, self-giving devotion.
sentences.chinese: 他想让我们全心全意去爱，无私奉献。

sentences.english: The ability to do their work wholeheartedly for the SSI.
sentences.chinese: 尽自己的能力全心全意为SSI工作。

sentences.english: I love you forever with all my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我永远刀会全心全意咁去爱你。

sentences.english: Billy loved Katie with all his heart. But he never told a Single soul.
sentences.chinese: 比利全心全意地爱着凯蒂，但是他从来没有告诉她。

sentences.english: For liquor, full cup symbolizes whole heartiness, very sincere.
sentences.chinese: 酒倒满杯表示全心全意。

definition: wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
concentrating one's thoughts and efforts/single-minded/bent on/intently
to concentrate entirely on sth/fully engaged/with full force
to focus/to concentrate/to give one's full attention
to concentrate one's attention completely (idiom)/with rapt attention
to set one's heart on sth (idiom)
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
